name: Switch Simulator
description:
Ever want to power on your Switch console or attach those neat little controllers to its sides, but don't want that nice portability of the console or any of the games?

Well... why not? That seems kinda odd, but I won't judge you, instead, have this!

"Switch Simulator"

Is an ACTION PACKED title, filled to the brim with content, experience the [censor] worthy clicks of the system, with a pixel tight fit! Have your heart-strings tug on with the tear-jerking error screens that the Switch is well loved for!

Not affiliated with Nintendo or any of their intellectual properties.

Controls:

Left Click - attach and detach left joypad

Right Click - attach and detach right joypad

P - power on & off the system

Why did I spend time on this?

We'll never know, random unknown developer!

DOWNLOAD FOR WINDOWS NOW!
